feed.title: OK-OSH
feed.subtitle: The Oklahoma City Open Source Hardware

entry.title: New Logo and meeting Saturday!
entry.content:
This Month

Saturday: Nov 08, In The Year of Our Robotic Overlords, 2014

11:30 am

@Prototek
401 NW 10th,
Oklahoma City, Oklahoma
73101

About “Updates!”

We’ve had an exciting week in gearing up the group. Logo, web hosting, github repo, and our first project update, we’re almost ready to roll out!


You’ve pressed the great “> Read More” artifact!
Now, you can never unsee this sentence.

About our Speaker

Lawrence

Lawrence is a Meta Smith.
He hacks large systems to see what creative and inexplicable outcome emerges from the collective.
In his infinite spare time, he contributes to the Maker Community.

Our Sponsors

Meeting space is provided thanks to Prototek. These awesome folks are passionate about creating a vibrant maker space in Oklahoma City. We thank them for providing meeting space for user groups and events. Prototek is collaborating with Techlahoma to create a positive impact on our tech community, which is an epic win for everyone!

Tasty lunch will be served thanks to Techlahoma.

usergroup.location = Prototek;

Prototek Prototek is a maker, fabrication, civic hacker and creator space located in Mid-Town Oklahoma City.

401 NW 10th St, Oklahoma City, Oklahoma 73103

Get directions via Google maps.

entry.title: Oklahoma Open Hardware
entry.content:
OK-OSH

Oklahoma Open Source Hardware

Where We will Meet

Second Saturday of the month 11:30am
at

@Prototek
401 NW 10th,
Oklahoma City, Oklahoma
73101

About “Our New Group”

We will be meeting regularly to discuss the exciting world of Open Source Hardware

So What exactly is Open Source Hardware

Our Sponsors

Meeting space is provided thanks to Prototek. These awesome folks are passionate about creating a vibrant maker space in Oklahoma City. We thank them for providing meeting space for user groups and events. Prototek is collaborating with Techlahoma to create a positive impact on our tech community, which is an epic win for everyone!

Tasty food will be served thanks to Techlahoma.
